features: 【PD 3.0 Fast Charger for iPhone】iPhone Charger equipped with 20W PD 3.0 USB Type C power delivery wall plug, PD 3.0 Quick-Charge USB C port provides Max 20W output power, charging your iPhone 13 up to 50% in just 30 minutes, saving over 1.5hrs for you.

【MFi Certified 】 With the MFi Chip, the USB-C to lightning cord equips automatic chip recognition function. The MFi Certification ensures 100% flawless compatibility with devices. No more trigger warning messages.

【Superior Safety Fast Charger】20W lightning charger has multipotent safety system ensures complete protection for your lightning devices. The UL certified wall charger built-in over-voltage protection, features a stable voltage. the lightning cable built-in smart chip to match the current required by devices automatically.

【Applicable Equipment】 Works With for iPhone 14/14 Pro/ 14Pro Max/13/13 Mini/13 Pro/12/12Pro/12 Pro Max/12 Mini/11/11 Pro/11 Pro Max/XS Max/XS/X/XR/8 Plus/8, iPad Pro/ iPad Air/ iPad, AirPods Pro. Standrad Charging Speed works with iPhone 7/7 Plus/6s/6s Plus/6/6 Plus/SE/5s/5/5c

【What you will get】3x 6FT Cable and 3 x 20W PD Wall Charger. We offer 7x24 hours of friendly customer service Just contact us and we can provide the brand with additional worry-free product support and a free customer service store!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Solid charger can’t beat the price
reviews.reviewText: I recently purchased the USB C Charger iPhone Charger Fast Charging【MFi Certified】3Pack 20W Type C Wall Charger Block with 6FT Long USB C to Lightning Cable, and I am quite satisfied with my purchase, which is why I am giving it a four-star rating.One of the highlights of this charger is its fast charging capability. The 20W power output allows for quick charging of my iPhone. I no longer have to wait for hours for my phone to reach a decent battery level. This has been a game-changer for me, especially when I'm in a rush and need my phone charged as quickly as possible.Another positive aspect is the MFi certification. This certification ensures that the charger is fully compatible with Apple devices, providing a safe and reliable charging experience. I have experienced no issues with compatibility, and the charger works seamlessly with my iPhone. I appreciate the peace of mind that comes with using a certified product.The inclusion of a 6ft long USB C to Lightning cable is a great addition to this package. The length of the cable allows for flexibility in charging my phone, whether it's on my desk or in bed. The cable itself feels sturdy and well-made, and I haven't experienced any fraying or breakage issues so far.The design of the charger block is compact and lightweight, making it convenient to carry around. It fits snugly into wall outlets without obstructing neighboring sockets. This is particularly useful when I'm traveling and need to charge my phone in hotel rooms or airports where power outlets may be limited.While I have had a positive experience overall, there is one minor drawback worth mentioning. The charging speed may not be as fast as advertised when multiple devices are connected to the charger simultaneously. While this is understandable, it would have been ideal if the charging speed remained consistent even with multiple devices connected.In conclusion, the USB C Charger iPhone Charger Fast Charging【MFi Certified】3Pack 20W Type C Wall Charger Block with 6FT Long USB C to Lightning Cable is a reliable and efficient charging solution for my iPhone. The fast charging capability, MFi certification, long cable length, and compact design make it a worthwhile purchase. Despite the slight decrease in charging speed when multiple devices are connected, I am satisfied with the overall performance of this charger.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewText: love these chargers, the same fast charger capacity but at a fraction of the cost! super long as well great for the bed.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Not all of the chargers worked.
reviews.reviewText: When the package arrived everything looked fine until I tried all of the chargers and only two of the three chargers worked. Other than that, the chargers charge very fast and work good.
